comments.body: Technically this is a breaking change to the API: I'm guessing it's not used much, however.
Yeah we're now defining breaking changes by whether it breaks flutter/tests or g3. If it doesn't then it's fine to remove symbols.
Sorry, I was unclear: I know it doesn't meet our definition of a "breaking change", I was just pointing out that it does break the API if anyone were using it, in case you didn't mean to break it.
